text:
Hey folks,
question for the devs:
Does anyone have an idea how to toggle "is_availible_for_new_content" in the meta.json of a module via the theme fields,json?

Tried it with `{{ theme.path.to.boolean }}` but this doesn't work in the meta.json of a module
You canâ€™t use HubL in JSON files, so you have to toggle it manually by just setting it to true or false.
yeah - I know. Thanks man. I've hoped that maybe anyone got somekind of "workaround"
